dmca.title: Copyright infringement and phishing cheat report
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital
Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your claim.

Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/legal.
 
Legal Response Team
THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.

-----Original Message-----
From: Kevin Fenn [mailto:Kevin@softisland.com] 
Sent: Thursday, December 29, 2005 2:43 PM
To: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: Copyright infringement and phishing cheat report

Hi theplanet.com

We received the reports from our buyers that someone copy our website [word
by word] , the site url is http://www.igtu.com [IP:70.84.181.146] and
hosting with theplanet.com , while our site is http://www.igxe.com . this
site has been hosting with theplanet.com from July 9, 2005.  they are using
paypal account 4vsoft inc. [ cqxuhongju@hotmail.com ] to accpet payment
online.

Our buyers complains that this site is exactly the same as our site and the
buyers pay through paypal, but got no service from this site.

we take it as Copyright infringement and phishing cheat as they copy our
whole site and collect money from our buyers but provide no service.

we have registered our trademark with USPTO [United States Patent and
Trademark Office], for your information , we are providing our registration
code and information details, please hide them from the the site owner of
igtu.com. 
http://tarr.uspto.gov/servlet/tarr?regser=serial&entry=78510319


For your reference, we provide one of claim reporting from our buyers:
[Mike87]:?They do look alot like your page.
[You]:?yes, i see
[You]:?i will report it to our manager [Mike87]:?You have not heared about
them before? Maybe I shall call my bank and try to annulate it.
coz I didn't get any service from them after payment , I keep trying to
contact with them but got no response.
[Mike87]:?I payed through Paypal tho, I think they have a "scam" protection
or alike?
If I get that money back im sure to buy from this site. Just worried they
gone for ever atm.
[You]:?This site doesn't belong to us, they copied our site word by word. we
will report it to paypal.com [Mike87]:?Scam network?  

We take the copyright infringement issue seriously , we have contacted with
the site owner but got no response, we need your help. we require taking
this server offline in 48 hours. 

Best Regards

Kevin Fenn
Kevin@softisland.com
Les Entreprises Softisland Inc.
Canada
